review_text: This was our third stay at Cindy’s place and everyone was the same. The house was clean and easy to get to and close to Elon campus. I would highly recommend it over staying at local hotels as it was much more homier and fun.
Second time staying here. Just as great as the first time! Highly recommend…

Everything was as described or better. Many little extras for our comfort. Cindy was very attentive & accommodating with allowing an earlier arrival for us which was a huge help with a busy weekend schedule in Chapel Hill. I’m pretty picky about where we stay & I felt as comfortable at this home as I do in my own!

This was our second visit using Cindy’s place and both times have been wonderful. I think it is so much better staying here than at any of the local hotels. Cindy is a wonderful and informative host and I highly recommend her place for any looking to use it while visiting Elon or any place near there

This was the perfect place for us to stay for our family's visit to Elon. It is adorably decorated and comfortably fit our family of 5 plus two dogs. The deck and completely fenced back yard were great. Cindy is a fantastic host - communicative and responsive. She has thought of everything to make for a comfortable stay and provides coffee pods, creamer and snacks!
Great place, great host - we can’t wait to go back!

Absolutely beautiful home, very clean with ample space. Perfectly decorated with very comfortable beds and lots of small touches including Keurig with pods, snacks, chocolate, toiletries, games, dog toys/bowls, etc. There was a huge, fenced back yard and it was so nice to have our dog with us.

Our family had a wonderful stay at Cindy’s place! It was very clean and had all amenities listed. The pictures of the property matched the house exactly. Home is in a great location in Elon, close to local restaurants and grocery stores but also in a private setting. Would recommend for a family traveling with littles as well!

Place was as advertised and Cindy was extremely responsive. Clean and simple home with some nice welcoming touches. Will return again! A great place to stay when visiting Elon and other area Universities

A great place to stay near Elon University. We attended a wedding there and the location was perfect to meet our friends (4 min away) easily. Having a comfortable home is so much more appealing than a hotel with our pups! This place definitely did not disappoint!
Fabulous place and host, can’t say enough about how lovely our stay was. Accurate description, super nice amenities and responsive and helpful host ! Highly recommend
The house was a beautiful and comfortable stay. Cindy was wonderful with communication and extending check out when our flights we changed at the last minute.

What a wonderful stay we had at Cindy’s place! The home was pristine, inviting, and filled with amenities that made us feel at home immediately. We have stayed at ABNB’s many times and Cindy’s home is a favorite, by far. There were plenty of toiletries, toilet paper, and towels. We also loved the well stocked coffee bar and fireplace. Cindy is a great host and checked in with us multiple times during our 9 day stay. We will definitely seek out Cindy’s home for future visits to the area.

We love Cindy's place! Everything about it is perfect, so much so that it's beginning to feel like our second home! The good news: a lot of other guests feel the same way. The bad news is the same. A long line of people are always huddling around the calendar, trying to find a spot! Thanks, Cindy, for understanding what it takes to make us comfortable and happy. And by the way, the new blue rug is great!
Very cozy and clean. Had lots of extras that most places don’t. Provided K cups, creamers, condiments, cleaning supplies, toilet paper, paper towels etc… Very quick to answer any questions.

Out of all of the Airbnb’s that I have stayed at this was the most comfortable, well stocked, clean, property with the friendliest host that I have come across. We had a fantastic day, and I would highly recommend this property to others.

Amazing! Amazing! Amazing!
Exceptional Experience!
You will be delighted and feel at HOME.
Cindy has thought of everything. You will be spoiled by all the thoughtful amenities and special touches that go above and beyond for guest, families and pets! I am already booking another stay.
From the ease of check-in/ access, to the beautiful furnishing and terrific location.
Privacy Fence, outdoor living spaces, fireplace, FULLY stocked kitchen and bath, great laundry and comfy beds. This home has it all!
Thank you Cindy for providing Home for a work-travel weary patron!❤️ See you again soon!

We wanted to find a place that was near Elon University, and Cindy‘s place was absolutely perfect. It felt like we were almost on campus. It’s clean and quiet and our family of four nicely. Will certainly be looking to return once school begins.
Perfect stay with everything you need close to Elon's campus!
Great Place and recommend it to anyone needing a place to stay in the area
Definitely one of the best stays I have had. Clean and nice place. The kitchen was well stocked and so were the restrooms. Felt like home. Cindy was very responsive and reasonable.
All of the amenities we wanted were provided (and more). The back yard was perfect for the dog to run around.

Cindy’s is the first house in what seemed to be a quiet family friendly neighborhood. Although the road leading into the neighborhood is well travelled it was always quiet inside and out. The home is laid out well, clean, bright, and tastefully decorated. Kitchen was very spacious & user friendly. Lots of counter space and cabinets. Enjoyed the waffle maker and was pleased she had a mixer and mini chopper. Plenty of supplies ( kitchen and bath & laundry soaps, paper products, trash & storage bags, foil and plastic wrap and household cleaners. Bed was very comfortable with several blanket/layer options. The amount of quality fluffy towels a BIG plus. Plenty of hot water and great water pressure in the shower. Glad were able to extend our stay by an additional night. Cindy was very helpful and friendly throughout our rental process .

What an absolutely great house! It was everything advertised! The location was fabulous. The backyard was amazing! It had a natural area with a glider and plenty of grass for the dogs to play. Cindy responded promptly when I had a question! This will be my go to when I need to go to Burlington! I have already booked my next stay!!

This Airbnb was perfect for our needs. It was clean, well stocked with big fluffy towels and linens. The kitchen had everything we could need including a snack basket.the furniture was very nice, big tv’s in every room. There is a cute front porch.
Cindy was very responsive. She checked with us to see if we needed anything. We will definitely go there again.

This place is exactly what it stated it was and what we were looking for. It’s immaculate and has a wonderful yard where my dogs were very happy. Cindy’s personal touches (dog treats, snack box, great selection of coffee and creamers, bottle of wine, NC magazines) made us feel like we were right at home. We will be back. Thanks Cindy!

The house was bright and cheery with plenty of room for the family. The back deck and yard are wonderful too. Cindy was a very friendly and responsive host. We loved the location and hope to visit again in the future.

This place is Spectacular! It is bright, fresh, airy, and comfortable! I stayed here for 32 days. It was absolutely perfect. The moment I walked in the door, it felt like home; every amenity one could hope for. Especially well stocked. I’ve already booked my next stay. If you have students at Elon, this is the place to get for visiting the kids. A 10 out of 10, without a doubt.

Southern Charmer was a wonderful place. We had a wonderful stay during parents weekend. We shared with a couple other couples and we all loved it rather than staying at a local hotel as we have done in the past. We had people over and the backyard was perfect for our gathering. We definitely will stay here again in the future.

Cindy is everything that you look for in a host. Welcome snacks upon arrival, thoughtful in every way, wonderful backyard, every kitchen utensil you’d want to make a home cooked meal, amazing mattresses, super clean and just perfect for our vacation. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!!
We had a great weekend visiting Elon University and staying at this location. Incredibly convenient and a beautiful house. We had 4 adults and a toddler and had plenty of room. Highly recommend!

Cindy's house only has one "problem:" It's so awesome that everyone who stays there agrees, which makes it hard to find open dates! We've stayed there twice, the first time for a vacation, the second to care for a hospitalized extended family member. We never even considered renting a place in Greensboro, even though it meant extra driving, 38 miles round trip; at least two and often more round trips a day. We preferred the nurturing comfort of Cindy's exceptionally clean, perfectly accommodated home to practicality. That pretty much sums it up.
Lovely!! So close to Elon. We loved it.
Cindy’s place was amazing- location is perfect- and home had everything you could possibly need as a guest. She was very responsive as a host and we are sure to stay there again!
Really over-the-top spectacular. A lot of absolutely wonderful, thoughtful small touches. Extraordinarily great beds and linens!

Cindy’s home was great. It had everything we needed for our short stay. Cindy even left a few treats for us and the coffee selection was great. We will definitely keep this home on the list for future visits to the area.
Great place, very spacious, cut and cozy and neat everything
Lovely home! Neat, clean and a happy place to stay:)

Cindy’s place was perfect. Great location for a quick visit to Elon University. She had all the essentials which made my stay easy and hassle free. I loved the extra touch of a magnifying mirror in the master bath, over head fan and charging stations. She even had lens wipes for eyeglasses! Great stay

We were in this air b&b for over a week, we couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay! The host is wonderful and takes the time to make the house extra comfortable for each guest. It was a blessing to be able to stay in a place that felt like home! The house was extremely clean and in a great location. I would recommend this place to anyone and everyone!

On a long road trip visiting Colleges for my daughter we found Cindy’s listing near Elon. It was clean, modern and very comfortable. Cindy couldn’t have been a better host. Communication was perfect. Will definitely be back if in the area again.

Our host Cindy made us feel welcome. The home is beautifully furnished. We appreciated our host providing wonderful amenities such as cold water bottles, multiple types of coffee pods, and a variey of snacks.
We enjoyed our stay very much and look forward to returning in the near future!

Look no further! This home is charming and welcoming and comes with an amazing host! Cindy is super responsive and willing to help. We experienced some crazy weather and she checked to make sure we were all ok and didn’t need anything. She has thought of all the little things to make your stay just like at home…need a lens wipe for your glasses? She’s got that! A ziplock for your leftover pizza? That’s there too! Forgot your salt and pepper for your morning eggs? You’ll find it in the cabinet!
The home is very clean and comfortable. The 3 bedrooms were perfect for traveling with multiple adults (our party consisted of myself, my sister, and my father). Everyone had their own space and never felt cramped. Huge fenced in backyard with a little squirrel friend living in the trees.
We will definitely seek out this home again when we return to North Carolina!

IF YOUR READING THIS....LOOK NO MORE! Just book it. You won't regret it.
We booked Cindy's place for a tennis tournament at Elon University. As a family that travels every weekend, this rental stood out. Cindy was very communicative before arrival which made check-in simple and easy. We were greeting with wine and chocolate....WE KNEW THIS WAS GOING TO BE GREAT! The house was clean, decorated beautifully, and large enough for the 3 of us to really spread out. A thunderstorm rolled through for the majority of the day and this cozy home created a perfect atmosphere for us to hunker down and spend the rainy day indoors. We loved it so much that we have added it to our saved homes and will continue to book Cindy's place for our 2x per year visit to Elon.
Cindy was a fantastic host.

We had a great stay here. The place was so clean and comfortable. We love the natural light all of the windows let in! It had a spacious fenced in back yard. We would recommend this place to anyone. Cindy, the host was so sweet and very communicative. We appreciate that!
We will stay here again in the future!

This is the nicest Airbnb anyone could ask for and the hospitality of our hostess, Cindy, was exceptional. I felt such a warm welcome to North Carolina and would highly recommend family and friends staying in her beautiful home. The kitchen is well stocked, the towels plush, the beds comfortable. All you could ask for and more! Better than a 5 star hotel!
Very nice stay at an affordable price.
Great host! Great place!
Great host
Another great stay
Very grateful to meet Xin
Always a pleasure!
Very kind and understanding. My stay with Xin has been great!
It’s always a pleasure to stay with Xin
Been staying with Xin and all their locations are worth every penny. I just booked again with them.
Xin is super friendly, kind, smart, responsive, & a fabulous host!
The place looked exactly as the images showed. It had everything we needed, including parking. Xin was very responsive and respectful!
Very nice people
Enjoyed our stay very much, clean, quite, calm, close to everything needed. Would come back again.
The stay was great 🥰

Xin’s place is just how it’s described. If you are looking for a clean and comfortable place to sleep and clean up then this place is perfect. We were there for a four day tournament so all we needed was a quiet, clean and comfortable spot! Xin’s place was perfect! Thank you!

I had a good stay at this Xin's place. The host was kind enough to waive the cleaning fee, but I was disappointed to find that the sheets were not fresh as they had crumbs and hair on them. Luckily, I had brought my own sheets, so I didn't have to sleep on dirty ones. I also found a toe nail under the night stand, which was quite gross and made me question the cleanliness of the place. Xin's place is peaceful enough to get a good nights rest but the doors of the rooms have a huge gap at the bottom, so I could hear other guests occasionally coming in and out. Parking was available on the property or on the street, which was convenient. The only thing I would suggest is to bring your own hand soap (and maybe own bedsheets.) Overall, it was a decent place to stay for a short trip.
good place. worth it.
Great host thank you for everything Xin such a beautiful soul 🦋💙
xin is Excellent host , will come back again .
Excellent
xin is the tmost amazing host. she is Xin is the most kind and sincere host. i adore her and i loved the room and the service. i will definitely be back.
the best

Xin was so helpful, friendly and quick to respond! Room had its own private bathroom and mini fridge, which was very nice. Xin always answered any questions I had and was so sweet and kind!
Definitely would stay here again when in the area!
I love the Broadway hotel. room B. It was peaceful, amazing, clean, private and quiet. I recommend this hotel to anybody.
This is a beautiful and charming old house with completely updated kitchen and bathroom. It’s very spacious and tastefully decorated. I would stay here again.

Clean and comfortable apartment with all the amenities. Centrally located in the heart of Burlington near Elon with plenty of parking. The apartment has historical details with modern upgrades. Would highly recommend!
My second stay! Clean and charming as always!
This place was much bigger than we expected. It was very comfortable and homey. Major plus were the washers and dryers. I would definitely stay here again.
There is a reason that she’s called a super host, it’s too bad I couldn’t rate it any higher than five stars. I wish I would have a reason to visit the area again. It was a wonderful place.
Absolutely loved this place! Will definitely be back.
Gayla went above and beyond in her place. She spares no expense from body soap to dryer sheets she had it all! One of the top 3 AirBNBs we’ve stayed in and we have stayed in them globally.

What a cozy, cared for apartment! Comfortable king size bed, nice size bathroom with fabulous water pressure in the shower, spacious living room with a desk too! Beautiful artistic touches without over cluttering. Extra goodies such as two toothbrushes and toothpastes as well as k cups and creamer/sugar to make coffee. This was super useful for short stays where you don’t want to bring/buy everything you need.

Gayla was a great host and the apartment was exactly as expected! She went the extra mile and had toiletries in the bathroom available if we needed them. There were laundry machines easily accessible too. It was a short walk to historic Burlington where we were able to get a bite and drink at local brewery. It was lovely and we would stay there again anytime. Already tried to rebook for parents weekend in the fall but sadly was not available. Thank you Gayla!

Absolutely Beautiful and Perfect! Gayla never misses anything, when you stay at one of her homes! The best host every time that we book with her. Gayla is also super friendly. Thanks again Gayla and husband for another perfect stay, at your home!
This is one of the best airbnbs I’ve stayed at!!
Terrific value. The place was even bigger than I thought. I’ve stayed at nearby hotels and this was way better. Will stay here again for sure!

My only problem wasn't Gayla's places problem, it was mine. Most people love a memory foam mattress but because of an accident as a child it's not enough support for me so that was the only thing that wasn't great but again that's because of my particular, rare situation.

Simply fabulous. Inside you are emerald in old charm and modern beautiful house.
5 minutes inside and you feel like you live there !
Place was great! Very clean and nice, would stay here again.
Phenomenal place to stay

Cute and clean! Was a perfect spot for me as I had a week of outdoor class and needed a comfortable place at the end of the day. Being able to cook my own meals was great and laundry was a huge bonus.
Everything was great, hence we extended our stay!

Having travelled across 25 countries, we can proudly say that this was one of the best AirBnB experiences ever. The attention to detail to all the little needs of the hosts with such care was the absolute epitome of hospitality for us (which is so difficult to get even in top hotels)
Gayla has poured her heart and soul into every corner of this home and it’s really visible the minute you step in
Highly recommend to anyone in the area!

We have stayed at Gayla's property multiple times. We love this house and Gayla is a great host. No detail is overlooked and we have everything we need. Without a doubt, we will stay with Gayla again!

This place is gorgeous! We had such a wonderful, relaxing time. The host was wonderful to communicate with, and all the logistics were super easy. We loved staying here and would love to come back again!

The home is beautiful. I loved all the original wood from the floors to the doors to the crown mouldings. The kitchen and bathroom have some modern touches but didn't distract from the original feel. Both kitchen and bath had everything needed for a pleasant stay. Very homey feeling! Loved it!

So much better in person! The picture really didn’t do it justice. It was much bigger than I thought, super easy to find, check in and check out were breeze, especially that there wasn’t a giant chore list, thank you, Gayla!
Very nice place. Was very comfortable and roomy. I’ll stay there again.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. The apartment was clean and spacious. Gayla was super friendly and was able to give great recommendations based on what I was interested in and looking to do. Will definitely stay again.

Very clean and comfortable apartment. Beautiful new appliances. Walkable neighborhood with sidewalks to downtown and the Arboretum. Busy street, but no issue soundwise particularly in the bedroom. Great value
Easy to find and get into - spacious, super clean, very comfortable bed, big kitchen - perfect for our needs while visiting our son at Elon. Will be saving for future visits.
Thanks for a great stay! Apartment had pleny of room to spread out and provided the perfect weekend home away from home for us.
Nice place to stay. Reasonably-priced.

A remarkable experience, the place was clean, every room was well stocked with appropriate necessities. The property itself reflected the historical character of the home and was decorated very nicely. I would highly recommend Gayla's place to anyone. Just a side note- we are accustomed to a sleep number bed so it did take a while to acclimate to a firm mattress. Minor issue. Location perfect, great parking.

Its a beautiful place to stay. It has historic beauty yet updated and modernized details to make you feel cozy and at home. I'm from NYC so I love that old brownstone/railroad apartment type of design. Exactly what I needed. I will be visiting again !!!
Gayla is a wonderful host. The apartment is lovely. Comfy bed and lovely linens. I’ll definitely be back again.

I stayed in Apt B at the McCauley House and it was absolutely perfect. The space was clean and comfortable! I absolutely loved the kitchen though I didn't get a chance to use it much. I would definitely stay here again. Gayla is a great host and the hospitality was top notch.
ANOTHER great stay at Gayla’s place! :)

Don’t even know where to start. It was beautiful. The bed was so amazing my god. We had just gotten back from the craziness of blue ridge rockfest and as horrible as the festival was, the air bnb helped make it better. Will definitely stay here again.

Gayla’s place was wonderful. Apartment is equipped with everything you need for a long or short term stay. Very clean and tasteful. Pictures and description matched exactly. Gayla was very quick to respond and extremely kind. My husband and pups enjoyed our stay! We will definitely be back!

This home was full of southern charm and the hostess, Gayla, was genuinely interested in making our stay as nice as possible. The home is so lovely! You can see that a lot of love went into the restoration of this old house. Loved the super comfy bed and relaxing in the front porch in particular. One of my favorite Airbnb’s ever!
perfect lodging experience.
nice and comfortable place to stay overnight.
great place to stay for business, very clean place, would stay again
Everything was clean as described and communication was well loved it
Great space, very thoughtful host, comfortable bed, cute safe neighborhood! All around a great experience at a great price point. Would definitely stay again.
Great & amazing place to stay for a night or 2. always a welcoming host to all
It's a back to back stay for me at Love place. There is no flaws and definitely will be back here again next time when I'm travelling to Mebane again 😉
always a peaceful get away after long hours of work. very clean environment & host is very fast to respond to messages 10/10 recommend
Perfect place to stay 😁
Always happy to stay here 😁
Perfect place to stay 😉

Very nice and cozy spot to settle down
Always the perfect place to stay.
Always the best place to stay. Bed is so comfortable
Always love to stay here everytime I've got some work in Mebane. Really feels like home and room is perfectly clean and well arranged.
Great place to stay.
Love was such a welcoming host, home looked just like the pictures. Will definitely be coming. here again.
great location , new clean home, and very accommodating host in love&family
I stayed this room for 18days for my flight test. This cozy and clean room made me to pass the test. Definitely will visit again.
Love was very welcoming when i stayed at her home. Her home is just gorgeous. It was so quiet and peaceful. I would love to visit again!!
Can’t beat it for what I paid. Great area, comfortable bed

Love’s place was exactly as described. Perfect for a low-budget overnight stay. Future guests just note that you will be sharing a bathroom with 2 strangers. Be prepared to bring your own hand towel and wash clothes. There is no coffee but a water cooler, which was nice. Love was very responsive and the room was minimal but clean and comfortable.

best stay in Grahm & surroundings! extremely clean and quiet.
thanks for hosting me love & family
Great place. Wonderful host

Loved it here! Love’s Airbnb had everything I needed for a peaceful stay. I loved how clean and minimalist the entire unit was, and Love was always responsive and provided clear, concise instructions. Great value for the price & nice, calm location near some good cafes and restaurants! Would definitely stay again!

Great location for our 1 night stay.
Only saw Love briefly on the driveway, didn't get to chat.

comfortable and quiet stay as always✔️ will stay again for few more days and definitely it's as my favorite spot to stay in town!!
staying at Love's keeps getting better with the addition of all you can drink purified water.
A comfortable bed and very clean room. Great communication. We enjoyed our stay.
great stay as always..
another great stay at Love family's house. strongly recommend it for everyone seeking clean, safe & peaceful stay.
The lock was hard for me to get into, my fault not hers! Didn’t know how yo use it😂. Made a couple suggestions when we chatted this morning…really slept well!

I really enjoyed my stay at Love’s bnb! I am looking for a place to return and I will definitely be back. The location is perfect for what I need and the space is very clean, tidy and comfy. The extra snacks and coffee were such a nice compliment. The home was very peaceful and calm, just what I needed! Thank you for welcoming me into your home!

extremely clean, beds are comfortable, and the location is superb! Love and her family are amazingly good people and great humans, and their home is soothing full of good vipe. I will definitely stay there again and strongly recommend it.
This was a great stay! Love was very responsive and it was a nice, clean, private room. Perfect pitstop during a long road trip!
Made a last minute booking and was pleasantly surprised by the accommodations. Love was very responsive when I asked questions and the snacks were a nice touch.
The host was very kind and helpful and the room was tidy. I also thought the bed was super comfortable. my sweetheart and I will definitely book again if we are in the area.

Love was a very hospitable person & we highly enjoyed staying at their place. It was very clean and looked exactly like the pictures. In addition, she kindly offered us snacks and provided a fresh drink upon arrival.

Ginger is a superb host! This was a perfect location and set up for our family as we traveled in for our daughter’s college graduation. Graham is a charming town and Ginger goes above and beyond to create a wonderful experience for her guests.
We especially appreciated her:
* responsive and proactive communication
* thoughtful touches throughout the home to welcome her guests
* comfortable furnishings and great beds and linens

Ginger's Place was absolutely charming. The home was very clean and spacious. We loved all the board games and cards. We relaxed on the back patio. We enjoyed walking through the neighborhood. It is suburban but very quiet. The neighbors were friendly! There was plenty of supplies and essentials for everyday living. We were able to prepare meals daily.
Ginger was very responsive and proactive. She was the kindest, most helpful and friendly host.
We would be happy to stay again and Highly Recommend to others!

We stayed for six nights in order to attend UNC-Chapel Hill's graduation events. It was a busy weekend and many places we had stayed before were unavailable. Plus we wanted affordable accommodations and a place large enough for four adults. Ginger's place was perfect! Not only did it fit our budget - it also exceeded our expectations. The location made it possible for us to try area restaurants on the nights we did not want to cook (even tho the well-equipped kitchen made it tempting to stay in!) All the bedrooms were spacious and had really comfortable beds and linens. The bathrooms were well appointed (plenty of towels) and included extras that even hotels no longer provide (loved the body wash). We streamed movies at night but books and games also were available. I know Ginger will go above and beyond to make her guests feel special whatever the occasion. While our son will be leaving North Carolina for his next adventure, we might be back on one of our own!

I must admit, I wasn't sure what to expect at first in Graham BUT this place was OUTSTANDING!!! The layout of the space and all of the furnishings were impeccable.
I don't think we could have asked for a better host. She is proactive with communicating and so accommodating.
I will recommend this place to any one I know in need of a place to book! I will reserve this place for future family visits!

We were extremely happy with our stay! The house was absolutely beautiful and the pictures in the listing were spot on. The hostess, Ginger, went above and beyond with communicating and was very pleasant to work with. We were in town for a wedding and the home was only minutes away from the venue and very close to restaurants and shops. The large backyard is wonderful for family and the house is spacious and is perfect for getting ready for a wedding! The neighborhood was very quiet and peaceful for relaxation time. We highly recommend this place!!! ♥️
P.S. I accidentally left my credit card and as we were traveling home Ginger messaged me and let me know in case I wanted to report it as lost or asked if I would like her to mail it to me instead. I so appreciated her getting in touch with me to let me know!!!
Ginger went above and beyond. if/when we come back this will be the place for us.

My family and I were in town for a youth soccer event and found Ginger’s place to be perfect for our family of 4. Her communication was great both before and during our stay. I would highly recommend this Airbnb as Ginger went above any beyond with many nice touches as well.

I cannot say enough wonderful things about this house! So warm and cozy, yet has so much space to spread out. Beautifully decorated and Ginger has added precious little surprises and touches thru out the house. Highly Recommend!

We had a great stay at Ginger’s! Since Ginger is just getting started with this airbnb there were minor kinks to work out but Ginger was quick to respond and is making the minor changes needed to ensure future guest with a great stay. There’s a few things we look for in an airbnb and Ginger’s place checked the boxes.
Friendly Host✔️
Good neighborhood✔️
Cleanliness✔️
Comfortable beds✔️
Good water pressure✔️
Great internet speeds✔️
Near to stores and restaurants✔️
5 Stars!
Impeccable ,clean house ! Went above and beyond. Such clear instructions and even left food n drinks for us. A must stay if in area!

Mike’s home was a welcome respite! Only a 2 night stay but I would love to come back for a longer retreat!
The kitchen was fantastically equipped. We enjoyed movies in the den and the kiddos setup the Xbox in a bedroom.
The primary bathroom is a spa retreat, and the soaking tub is highly recommended! I had no problem relaxing til my fingers and toes were pruny, listening to music from the bathroom Roku TV.
We couldn’t take advantage of the lovely patio due to the rain, but I hope to in a future stay. We will be back!
Great home! Wonderful visit 😊
Fantastic start to finish, true to details and information, Mike is a great host! Definitely will stay again!

Mike’s house was the perfect place to stay for our visit to Elon. His home is beautifully appointed, very clean, and we felt right at home. Mike was in touch to make sure we had everything we needed. Will definitely stay again!
Highly recimmend this house. Mike is a great host. House was spotless and beautiful. He has a well equipped kitchen complete with coffee and beverages!!! Thanks so much Mike!!
Mike’s place was perfect for a group of us who were in town for a wedding. The house was lovely and Mike was very responsive. Highly recommend!
We had a great stay at Mike’s place. Everything was clean and he was a great host. The house was comfortable and had everything we needed. We will definitely stay at his place again!

My family and I stayed at this home for a short period of time but we felt right at home. Mike is very kind and responsive. The house is very clean and well appointed. A very positive experience overall !

Mike was a fantastic host and great home. Appreciated the food and drinks that he had waiting for us. House was comfortable and clean. If I could give more than 5 stars I would have.
FYI - if you are short like I am or have children, note that the beds are higher than standard height. Not a big deal for me as this has happened before and I now travel with a folding stepstool in my trunk - but want to let others know.

This home was absolutely gorgeous. The lawn and everything was perfect. This is definitely a top spot if I ever need to come back to Burlington. Mike was an absolute amazing host and kept in contact all the way up to checkout. He left very detailed instructions for everything. This home is definitely a hidden gem.

We returned for the second time and the accommodations were just as great as the first time! This is a very clean, comfortable, well-appointed home. The home is super comfy, beautifully decorated, and stocked to the gills. A/C was responsive and it was easy to keep the home at a comfortable temperature despite record heat wave during my visit. Stacey and her family are right next door.
Stacey has innumerable thoughtful touches throughout and the unit comes stocked with anything you might've forgotten--toiletries (not just a basic shampoo/conditioner but a huge variety of hair, skin, facial products from which to choose if you've left anything at home), first aid items, kitchen staples, a picnic basket & cooler, you name it. She has provided all kinds of helpful instructions and labels around the house to assist with locating anything you might want or need, figuring out how to use wifi/TV, etc. She has seemingly thought of everything. No wondering if you've come to the right place upon check-in or when returning, exhausted and bleary-eyed, to go to bed for the night, as is so often the case with other private rental homes.
I availed myself of the umbrella table on the back deck (with view of her well-tended garden and a cute little herb container garden by my back door), fully stocked kitchen for preparing breakfast, the cooler for keeping drinks cool during scorching graduation day weather and packing up for move-out the next day, and a great assortment of welcoming snacks that greeted me when I walked into the house.
The living room TV is a nice size and offered a great selection of streaming channels, which was comforting when I ended up traveling unexpectedly solo on this trip and was afraid I too might end up missing my daughter's graduation and holed up with covid myself (which thankfully didn't come to pass!). I didn't use these, but there was a very nice looking laundry setup and TV in the bedroom as well, along with DVDs, games & books in the living room.
This time, I ended up having the place to myself after covid and other health problems prevented other family members from joining me. When she heard my spouse had stayed home with covid and that I was quarantining for my first day in town just to be on the safe side, she gave comforting reassurances about why I probably wouldn't get it, then kindly delivered a 4-pack of covid tests to my door.
Bottom line: I can't say enough about how awesome Stacey is. If you're someone who's into super fancy/formal, and don't plan to use a kitchen or laundry at all, I suppose a hotel might be a better bet for you. Or if you know you'll need to be in walking distance of campus or some other specific locale, then this isn't the place for you. Otherwise, I can't think of any reason to stay anywhere else on your next visit to Burlington, especially for parties of 2-5.
